div.p: This value set expansion contains 81 concepts.

tr.td: Mutation scanning of the entire coding region
Sequence analysis of the entire coding region
Tetra-nucleotide repeat by PCR or Southern Blot
Trinucleotide repeat by PCR or Southern Blot

title.value: Cross-version ValueSet R5.GenomicStudyMethodType for use in FHIR R4

description.value: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/genomicstudy-methodtype|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.

purpose.value:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/genomicstudy-methodtype|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5 in FHIR R4.
The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements: * `GenomicStudy.analysis.methodType`
The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations * _no concepts_
Following are the generation technical comments:
FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/genomicstudy-methodtype|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
